prompt:
Return ONLY a JSON object.
Rewrite the draft into a longer Korean blog post written ONLY in Korean (Hangul).
- Do NOT use Chinese characters.
- At least 3 paragraphs
- At least 450 characters
- No HTML tags. Use blank lines between paragraphs.
- Must include headings: ## 핵심 요약 / ## 내용 정리 / ## 의미와 관전 포인트 / ## 한 줄 결론
JSON format: {"title":"...","body":"..."}
